attributes.action: Save the building "Mr Smith's" in Warrington, Cheshire
attributes.additional_details: A beautiful, nationally known building in the heart of Warrington, Cheshire. This should be a listed building or transformed into something of use to The town-not demolished!!

rejection.details:
This is a local council matter, but you can apply to English Heritage at

http://www.english-heritage.org.uk/

to find out about how to apply to list a building.
